member.name: T:RfidAssetReader3M.Helpers.Checksum
member.summary: Contains helper functions for checksum calculation.

member.name: M:RfidAssetReader3M.Helpers.Checksum.CalculateCrc16(System.Span{System.Byte})
member.summary: Calculates modified CRC16-CCITT. The final output of this CRC is XOR'ed with 0xFFFF.
member.param: Input data for the checksum calculation.

member.name: T:RfidAssetReader3M.ReaderCommunication.Commands.ListTagsCommand
member.summary: Represents a command that requests the RFID reader to return all present tags.

member.name: M:RfidAssetReader3M.ReaderCommunication.Commands.ListTagsCommand.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:RfidAssetReader3M.ReaderCommunication.Commands.RawCommand
member.summary: Represents a command object that handles header and checksum data.

member.name: M:RfidAssetReader3M.ReaderCommunication.Commands.RawCommand.#ctor(RfidAssetReader3M.ReaderCommunication.CommunicationType,System.Span{System.Byte})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Raw command to send to the reader.

member.name: T:RfidAssetReader3M.ReaderCommunication.Commands.ReaderCommand
member.summary: A command to send to the RFID reader.

member.name: P:RfidAssetReader3M.ReaderCommunication.Commands.ReaderCommand.CommunicationType
member.summary: Gets the communication type header byte.

member.name: P:RfidAssetReader3M.ReaderCommunication.Commands.ReaderCommand.Command
member.summary: Gets the raw command to send to the reader. This does not include any of the header bytes or the checksum.

member.name: P:RfidAssetReader3M.ReaderCommunication.Commands.ReaderCommand.Checksum
member.summary: Gets the modified CRC16-CCITT checksum of the data. This checksum matches the format expected by the 3M RFID reader.

member.name: P:RfidAssetReader3M.ReaderCommunication.Commands.ReaderCommand.FullCommand
member.summary: Gets the full command containing all header information and the checksum. The data is in the format expected by the 3M RFID reader.

member.name: M:RfidAssetReader3M.ReaderCommunication.Commands.ReaderCommand.Send(RfidAssetReader3M.ReaderCommunication.Transceivers.IReaderTransceiver)
member.summary: Sends the command to the specified transceiver.
member.param: The transceiver that is connected to the RFID reader.
member.returns: The response from the RFID reader.

member.name: T:RfidAssetReader3M.ReaderCommunication.CommunicationType
member.summary: The type of command. The reader expects different header values for different command types.

member.name: F:RfidAssetReader3M.ReaderCommunication.CommunicationType.Setup
member.summary: Used in the initial setup of the reader.

member.name: F:RfidAssetReader3M.ReaderCommunication.CommunicationType.Operation
member.summary: Used in the normal operation of the reader to read and write tags.

member.name: T:RfidAssetReader3M.ReaderCommunication.NotConnectedException
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when an attempt is made to interact with a reader that is not connected.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:RfidAssetReader3M.ReaderCommunication.NotConnectedException.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:RfidAssetReader3M.ReaderCommunication.Responses.IResponseFactory
member.summary: Delegates instantiation of away from the calling class.

member.name: M:RfidAssetReader3M.ReaderCommunication.Responses.IResponseFactory.CreateFromData(System.Span{System.Byte})
member.summary: Creates a using data from the reader.
member.returns: A reader response containing the parsed data.

member.name: T:RfidAssetReader3M.ReaderCommunication.Responses.ListTagsResponse
member.summary: A response to a .

member.name: M:RfidAssetReader3M.ReaderCommunication.Responses.ListTagsResponse.#ctor(System.Span{System.Byte})
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Full response from the RFID reader.

member.name: P:RfidAssetReader3M.ReaderCommunication.Responses.ListTagsResponse.Factory
member.summary: Gets an instance of a factory that creates a new instance of .

member.name: T:RfidAssetReader3M.ReaderCommunication.Responses.RawResponse
member.summary: Represents a response object that handles header and checksum data.

member.name: F:RfidAssetReader3M.ReaderCommunication.Responses.RawResponse.MaxFullResponseSize
member.summary: The maximum possible size of a full response. Max size is governed by the max data length (255 bytes) + the header (3 bytes).

member.name: F:RfidAssetReader3M.ReaderCommunication.Responses.RawResponse.MinFullResponseSize
member.summary: The minimum possible size of a full response. The minimum size is 3 bytes for the header + 2 bytes for the checksum.

member.name: M:RfidAssetReader3M.ReaderCommunication.Responses.RawResponse.#ctor(System.Span{System.Byte},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Full response from the reader including checksum and header.
Allows continuing with an invalid checksum.

member.name: P:RfidAssetReader3M.ReaderCommunication.Responses.RawResponse.Factory
member.summary: Gets an instance of a factory that creates a new instance of .

member.name: T:RfidAssetReader3M.ReaderCommunication.Responses.ReaderResponse
member.summary: A command response sent back from the reader.

member.name: P:RfidAssetReader3M.ReaderCommunication.Responses.ReaderResponse.CommunicationType
member.summary: Gets the communication type header byte.

member.name: P:RfidAssetReader3M.ReaderCommunication.Responses.ReaderResponse.Response
member.summary: Gets the raw command to send to the reader. This does not include any of the header bytes or the checksum.

member.name: P:RfidAssetReader3M.ReaderCommunication.Responses.ReaderResponse.Checksum
member.summary: Gets the modified CRC16-CCITT checksum of the data. This checksum matches the format expected by the 3M RFID reader.

member.name: P:RfidAssetReader3M.ReaderCommunication.Responses.ReaderResponse.FullResponse
member.summary: Gets the full response from the reader including checksum and header.

member.name: P:RfidAssetReader3M.ReaderCommunication.Responses.ReaderResponse.IsChecksumValid
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the provided checksum matches the calculated checksum of the data.

member.name: T:RfidAssetReader3M.ReaderCommunication.Transceivers.IReaderTransceiver
member.summary: Handles low level communication between the application and a 3M RFID reader.

member.name: P:RfidAssetReader3M.ReaderCommunication.Transceivers.IReaderTransceiver.IsReady
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the channel is ready to communicate.

member.name: M:RfidAssetReader3M.ReaderCommunication.Transceivers.IReaderTransceiver.Transceive(RfidAssetReader3M.ReaderCommunication.Commands.ReaderCommand,RfidAssetReader3M.ReaderCommunication.Responses.IResponseFactory)
member.summary: Communicates with a reader by sending a command and then reading the response.
member.param: Command that will be sent to the reader.
Response factory that will be used to create a response object.
member.returns: The response to the command that was sent to the reader.

member.name: T:RfidAssetReader3M.ReaderCommunication.Transceivers.ReaderSerialTransceiver
member.summary: A reader channel that uses a serial port for the underlying communication.

member.name: M:RfidAssetReader3M.ReaderCommunication.Transceivers.ReaderSerialTransceiver.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: Serial Communications Port that is connected to the reader.

member.name: T:RfidAssetReader3M.ReaderCommunication.Transceivers.ReaderStreamTransceiver
member.summary: Handles conversion between stream of data between the application and reader to distinct commands and responses.

member.name: M:RfidAssetReader3M.ReaderCommunication.Transceivers.ReaderStreamTransceiver.#ctor(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: RFID Reader stream to send and receive from.

member.name: T:RfidAssetReader3M.Rfid3MReader
member.summary: Reads ISO/IEC 15693 asset tags using a 3M 810 RFID reader.
